long_description: Spend the whole day climbing at the crag or bouldering with friends in the comfortable women's evolv Elektra Rock Shoes. They provide comfort, sensitivity and a great fit for climbers of all levels. Toe rands of varying thicknesses enhance durability in high-wear zones, such as the front of the toe, without being cumbersome. Teardrop MX-P 1mm half-length midsoles add edging power without sacrificing flexibility and sensitivity for technical moves and smearing. High-performance 4.2mm TRAX high-friction rubber soles cling to rock. Comfortable bedroom-slipper-feel lets you climb all day on long multipitch routes or at the gym without mashing your toes. Rip-and-stick straps make it easy to get the Elektra shoes on and off in a hurry. Flexible and durable synthetic suede uppers resist stretching and dry quickly for long life; perforations allow airflow. Form delivers an asymmetric toe profile that allows sensitivity and edging power while maintaining comfort. evolv Elektra Rock Shoes have nylon linings that add comfort by managing moisture inside. Dual heel loops to ease entry.
short_description: Spend the whole day climbing at the crag or bouldering with friends in the comfortable women's evolv Elektra Rock Shoes. They provide comfort, sensitivity and a great fit for climbers of all levels.
